evidence.claim: Egnyt utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure, supporting scalable applications.
The platform is compliant with HL7 and FHIR standards to ensure interoperability in health tech.
The company integrates with various EHR systems using HL7 specifications for data exchange.
Egnyt employs data streaming technologies for real-time analytics and processing.
Egnyt mentions using Azure services for enhanced data management capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse functionality found.
